lines.text: Telegram for Santa! Telegram for Santa! Telegram for Santa! Telegram for Santa! Telegram for Santa!

# One day in every year, / Old Santa takes a rest / And leads the big balloon parade / Dressed in his very best. / He leaves his Arctic palace / And drives off in his sleigh. / To tell the population that the toys are on display. / He calls on every city / In every land and clime. / So all the boys and girls will know / It's almost Christmas time. / The people on the street / Have come from far and near / To follow Santa to the store / And see the toy premiere. / See the dwarfs, funny men. / Each one is a clown. / They cause a lot of laughter as they / Travel through the town. #

[singing]
# Hear what we want this Christmas season. #
# I want a drum, a spinning top, / A hobby horse, a lollipop, / A little choo-choo that I can woo-woo / Will make me happy. #
# I'd like a doll with eyes of blue. / And golden curls and dimples, too. / One of those dollies, / That's in the Follies / Would make me happy. #
